# American Time Use Survey (ATUS) Shiny App

____/3 Introduction to the project (Report)

#### We have created a Shiny App that helps visualize certain aspects of the ATUS from 2003 - 2015. There are multiple data sets from the ATUS survey; we primarily used the activity summary data set and the cps data set which provided data about the respondents.
